properties.name: Thermal Dynamics
properties.description:
Thermal Dynamics: Thermal gets Dynamic! Adds ducts - transportation for Redstone Flux, Fluids, and Items!

Redstone Flux: Redstone Flux API - Energy Transfer in Minecraft.

CoFH World: Customizable and powerful world generation!
